text:
Hello, Producer-san.
Thank you, what's up?

"Hey, Amana. How are you feeling?
I've been concerned about your legs."

The doctor said I can start returning
to dance lessons soon too.

...Yeah.
Um, can I ask you something?

At the time, the producer
Followed me up, though.

Thinking back, I believe it was Amana's fault for
wearing shoes that were too big and causing trouble.

Can I apologize properly so that Amana can
move forward with her feelings?

Last time, I caused trouble and I'm really sorry.
I'll be more careful from now on.
"Understood. I've heard you loud and clear."
